item.title: Making a Static Website
item.description: I made this website using Hugo via the blogdown package in R. Hugo is one of many static website generators that provides a simpler alternative to customary dynamic websites, which is especially useful for personal pages and blogs where the content of the page is not dependent on input from site visitors. You can read here the reasons why static websites may offer some utility over dynamic ones. Choosing a Static Website Generator Even though I have been using RStudio IDE regularly, I didn’t initially resort to the blogdown package but decided to test Jekyll out, which is the generator for pages that use the .
